nthgen.name: NTHGEN
nthgen.description: A NTHGEN TEAM MUST ALWAYS HAVE A PROTOTYPE, EVEN IF IT IS NOT DEPLOYED TO BATTLE. THE ENTIRE TEAM’S STATS ARE UPDATED BASED ON THE PROTOTYPE’S STATLINE AT THE START OF A BATTLE. WHEN THE PROTOTYPE IS DESTROYED, A NEW ONE MUST BE PAID FOR IMMEDIATELY DURING THE AFTER-MISSION. IF THE REPLACEMENT CANNOT BE AFFORDED, REMOVE 2 EXISTING UNITS FROM THE ROSTER AND LOSE ALL RU TO GAIN A NEW PROTOTYPE.

zone_raiders.name: Generalist
zone_raiders.description: A well-rounded force for taking on any mission.

braced.name: Braced
braced.description: This model cannot be moved by enemy attacks or the concussive weapon ability. It is immune to the Stunning weapon ability.

tactical_sense.name: Tactical Sense
tactical_sense.description: This model generates 2 Command Points in the Preparation Phase if it is the Mission Leader.

catfall.name: Catfall
catfall.description: This model ignores fall damage for falls of distances up to its speed stat.

counter_attack.name: Counter Attack
counter_attack.description: When missed by an enemy melee attack, this model may immediately make a free melee attack targeting the enemy model that missed instead of moving

sentry.name: Sentry
sentry.description: This model ignores the attack penalty for Overwatch Fire.

dodger.name: Dodger
dodger.description: When this model performs only movement actions during its activation, it may Hunker Down automatically at the end of the activation.

dual_wield.name: Dual Wield
dual_wield.description: This model may attack with two secondary Ranged weapons as a single Shooting attack action. They may target different models.

heads_down.name: Heads Down
heads_down.description: This model improves its cover modifier against enemy attacks from -2 to -4.

flanker.name: Flanker
flanker.description: This model gains a further +2 bonus to Shooting attacks and Shooting attack strength when attacking a target that is affected by Crossfire or Point-Blank bonuses.

pistoleer.name: Pistoleer
pistoleer.description: This model’s non-grenade secondary Ranged weapons gain +4 Range

ambidextrous.name: Ambidextrous
ambidextrous.description: This model may equip two melee weapons and attack once with each weapon. The second attack chosen is at a -4 Penalty

tech_affinity.name: Tech Affinity
tech_affinity.description: Interface and Mark Target actions are at +2 Aptitude. This model may use Interface Action.

dataplane_navigator.name: Dataplane Navigator
dataplane_navigator.description: After this model performs an interface action with a DataNode, you may spend a Command Point. If you do so, the DataNode can be still be used instead of shutting down.

fast_loader.name: Fast Loader
fast_loader.description: This unit automatically removes all Out of Ammo tokens if it did not make any attacks this activation.

fixer.name: Fixer
fixer.description: This model gains Repair Action: Make an Aptitude check. On a success, remove Armor Failure from itself or a friendly model in base contact.

signals_warrior.name: Signals Warrior
signals_warrior.description: This model cannot be affected by enemy Mark Target actions. The model may use a Tech Jammer item without spending a Battery Token or Command Points.

breacher.name: Breacher
breacher.description: This model may take the Action: Breaching Shot: Make a Shooting Attack at -4. On a hit, the attack does no damage but automatically inflicts Armor Failure.

bombardier.name: Bombardier
bombardier.description: Grenades used by this model gain +4 range.

ballistic_trace.name: Ballistic Trace
ballistic_trace.description: Enemies that miss this target with a Shooting attack are automatically Marked.

medic.name: Medic
medic.description: This model gains +4 on aptitude checks for Heal actions.

elusive.name: Elusive
elusive.description: This model can never be targeted by enemy Overwatch.

fast_striker.name: Fast Striker
fast_striker.description: This model ignores multiple opponent penalty in melee and never triggers counter-attack.

brute_force.name: Brute Force
brute_force.description: This model’s melee power attacks gain the Concussive weapon ability and +2 Strength

die_hard.name: Die Hard
die_hard.description: Failed damage checks no longer cause this model to go Down. Instead, the model suffers 2 wounds.

tough.name: Tough
tough.description: This model may ignore penalties and effects suffered from its first wound.

headshot.name: Headshot
headshot.description: Enemies Taken Out by this model’s Shooting attacks are Eliminated instead of Downed

quickdraw.name: Quickdraw
quickdraw.description: Firing a secondary Ranged weapon no longer ends the turn.

showdown.name: Showdown
showdown.description: This model may make an attack on every enemy model within 6 inches when using a Secondary Weapon

nerves_of_steel.name: Nerves of Steel
nerves_of_steel.description: This Model ignores its first Suppression Token

tactical_directive.name: Tactical Directive
tactical_directive.description: This model generates 3 Command Points in the Preparation Phase if it is the Mission Leader Replaces Tactical Sense.

tactical_mastery.name: Tactical Mastery
tactical_mastery.description: This model generates 4 Command Points in the Preparation Phase if it is the Mission Leader Replaces Tactical Directive.

assaulter.name: Assaulter
assaulter.description: Spend a Command Point: This unit may make a free action Shooting attack at the end of any activation in which all it did was make movement actions.

forward_positioning.name: This model may be deployed up to 6 inches beyond its normal deployment area for the mission

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy attacks or actions from over 12 inches away. The model loses all benefits of stealth after it is targeted or it makes a Shooting attack.

snap_fire.name: Snap Fire
snap_fire.description: After being missed by an enemy Shooting attack, this model may immediately make a Primary Weapon Shooting attack back at the attacker as if using Overwatch. Gain an Out of Ammo token.

firebase.name: Firebase
firebase.description: This model does not gain Out of Ammo tokens when performing Suppression Fire

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.description: This model grants Cover to friendly models in Base Contact

superior_stealth.name: Superior Stealth
superior_stealth.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy attacks or actions from over 8 inches away. The model loses all benefits of Superior Stealth after it is targeted or it makes a Shooting attack. Replaces Stealth.

killer_instinct.name: Killer Instinct
killer_instinct.description: This model restores 1 Wound when it takes out an enemy with any attack.

skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
skirmisher.description: Making a Shooting attack no longer ends the turn for this model. It may not make another Shooting attack this turn with that weapon unless it is using weapon with the Rapid Weapon ability.

sustained_burst.name: Sustained Burst
sustained_burst.description: This Weapon may make Burst(x) attack but does not become Out of Ammo afterwards.

rapid_weapon.name: Rapid Weapon
rapid_weapon.description: Attacks made with this weapon do not end the activation

bulky.name: Bulky
bulky.description: This weapon cannot make Shooting attacks, aimed attacks or be used in overwatch on turns in which the model has taken a movement action. Using this weapon requires all remaining actions.

short_range.name: Short Range
short_range.description: Cannot make attacks beyond the listed effective range.

blast.name: Blast
blast.description: On Hit: creates blast radius of AoE(x), all units within the blast are affected by the weapon.

beam.name: Beam
beam.description: When making a Shooting attack, make a separate attack roll against each model along a straight line to the target and within line of sight.

stunning.name: Stunning
stunning.description: On Damage: Target wounded by this weapon lose an action from their next activation

concussive.name: Concussive
concussive.description: On Hit: Target is pushed directly back 2 inches. May potentially trigger falls.

rupturing.name: Rupturing
rupturing.description: On Damage: Target that is damaged by this weapon suffers 2 wounds instead of 1.

burst.name: Burst
burst.description: This weapon may make (x) attacks when used. Burst Attacks may be split amongst enemy targets within 2 inches of each other. After making a Burst attack, gain an Out of Ammo token.

brutal.name: Brutal
brutal.description: On Hit: Successful hits by this weapon immediately causes the target to suffer a wound.

ignores_cover.name: Ignores Cover
ignores_cover.description: This weapon ignores cover when making a Shooting attack.

grants_counter_attack.name: Grants Counter-Attack
grants_counter_attack.description: Grants Counter-Attack +x Bonus to Melee Attack Roll

speed_modifier.name: Speed Modifier
speed_modifier.description: This unit must take (x) modifier of speed.

spare_battery.name: Spare Battery
spare_battery.description: Each Battery carried grants the carrier 1 Battery Token per game. A Battery Token may be consumed to enhance a Powered equipment item or provide a model with a free single action move per activation.

auto_reloader.name: Auto-Reloader
auto_reloader.description: This model may remove all of its Out of Ammo tokens as a free action.
auto_reloader.flavor: Single Use: May be used only once Per Battle.

defense_matrix.name: Defense Matrix
defense_matrix.description: Action: Give a friendly model within 8 inches the Hunker Down status. If the chosen friendly model has not yet activated this round, Hunker Down is not removed by its activation this round.
defense_matrix.flavor: Excess Power: May spend a battery token to extend range to 16 inches.

smoke_canister.name: Smoke Canister
smoke_canister.description: The model may spend one action to place an AoE2 Cloud template centered within 8 inches. The Cloud counts as a Low Visibility Area of Terrain with Opaque and Covering. The cloud disappears at the end of each round on a roll of 13+.
smoke_canister.flavor: Single Use: May be used only once Per Battle.

interface_deck.name: Interface Deck
interface_deck.description: Allows Interface Action with a +4 Bonus to Aptitude for the roll.

cutter_tools.name: Cutter Tools
cutter_tools.description: Action: Cuts open a Medium Profile-sized hole in a wall or floor that is up to 1 inch thick. Leave a Hole token to represent the area removed. A Small or Medium model may move through the hole.
cutter_tools.flavor: Single Use: May be used only once Per Battle. Powered: May spend a Battery Token for an additional use.

trauma_kit.name: Trauma Kit
trauma_kit.flavor: Single Use: May be used only once Per Battle.

nano_infusion.name: Nano-Infusion
nano_infusion.description: Free action: Automatically pass all survival stat checks until end phase.
nano_infusion.flavor: Single Use: May be used only once Per Battle.

comms_uplink.name: Comms Uplink
comms_uplink.description: When this model is Active, you may gain an extra command point at the Preparation Phase.

tech_jammer.name: Tech Jammer
tech_jammer.description: Action: Spend 1 Battery Token or 1 Command Point: Choose an enemy unit within 8 inches of this model. You may give that unit an Out of Ammo, Suppression or Armor Failure token which is removed at the end of the round.

magnetic_boots.name: Magnetic Boots
magnetic_boots.description: You may make an aptitude check to prevent an involuntary fall or push, stopping the model from being moved.
magnetic_boots.flavor: Excess Power: May spend a battery token to automatically pass this test.

compressed_rations.name: Compressed Rations
compressed_rations.description: Gain 1 Reroll on any Survival, Shooting, Melee or Aptitude Check made by this Model.
compressed_rations.flavor: Single Use: May be used only once Per Battle

hazard_inoculation.name: Hazard Inoculation
hazard_inoculation.description: May reroll a survival check from Hazard Areas or spend one action to remove the effects of Radiation and NanoContamination on itself or a friendly model in base contact.
hazard_inoculation.flavor: Single Use: May be used only once Per Battle

hardLight_emitter.name: HardLight Emitter
hardLight_emitter.description: Action: Creates a HardLight Barrier terrain object within 8 inches of the model. The HardLight Barrier is removed when this model is no longer in the Active state.
hardLight_emitter.flavor: Single Use: May be used only once Per Battle. Powered: May spend a Battery Token to use an additional time.

scouting_sensor.name: Scouting Sensor
scouting_sensor.description: +2 bonus to Mark Target actions. This model ignores the Stealth skill on enemies.

descent_harness.name: Descent Harness
descent_harness.description: The model may fall any distance as part of its activation without penalty or harm.

alloy_shield.name: Alloy Shield
alloy_shield.description: This model gains +2 Defense Bonus on top of other Armor bonuses. This model may not use or equip Primary Weapons. This model may be used as Cover by other friendly models.
